statements.insert: INSERT INTO T_DQMS_QUICK (OID, PlantLibOID, OccurrenceLibOID, PartOID, LotNo, OemLibOID, WorkUserOID, WriteDt, PoorCnt, Title, OccurrenceAreaLibOID, InduceLibOID, DefectDegreeLibOID, ImputeLibOID, ImputeDepartmentOID, ImputeSupplierOID, Summary, PoorDetail, RecurrenceFl, OccurrencePlace, OccurrenceDt, CorrectDecisionLibOID, MeasureResponseDt, Qa, BlockadeMaterialFl, BlockadeOutProductFl, BlockadeProcessProductFl, BlockadeFinishProductFl, BlockadeStorageProductFl, BlockadeShipProductFl, PlanUserOID, PoorPicture) VALUES (#OID#, #PlantLibOID#, #OccurrenceLibOID#, #PartOID#, #LotNo#, #OemLibOID#, #WorkUserOID#, #WriteDt#, #PoorCnt#, #Title#, #OccurrenceAreaLibOID#, #InduceLibOID#, #DefectDegreeLibOID#, #ImputeLibOID#, #ImputeDepartmentOID#, #ImputeSupplierOID#, #Summary#, #PoorDetail#, #RecurrenceFl#, #OccurrencePlace#, #OccurrenceDt#, #CorrectDecisionLibOID#, #MeasureResponseDt#, #Qa#, #BlockadeMaterialFl#, #BlockadeOutProductFl#, #BlockadeProcessProductFl#, #BlockadeFinishProductFl#, #BlockadeStorageProductFl#, #BlockadeShipProductFl#, #PlanUserOID#, #PoorPicture#)
statements.update:
UPDATE T_DQMS_QUICK SET OID = #OID#
PlantLibOID = #PlantLibOID#
Title = #Title#
OccurrenceLibOID = #OccurrenceLibOID#
PartOID = #PartOID#
LotNo = #LotNo#
OemLibOID = #OemLibOID#
WorkUserOID = #WorkUserOID#
WriteDt = #WriteDt#
PoorCnt = #PoorCnt#
OccurrenceAreaLibOID = #OccurrenceAreaLibOID#
InduceLibOID = #InduceLibOID#
DefectDegreeLibOID = #DefectDegreeLibOID#
ImputeLibOID = #ImputeLibOID#
ImputeDepartmentOID = #ImputeDepartmentOID#
ImputeSupplierOID = #ImputeSupplierOID#
Summary = #Summary#
PoorDetail = #PoorDetail#
RecurrenceFl = #RecurrenceFl#
OccurrencePlace = #OccurrencePlace#
OccurrenceDt = #OccurrenceDt#
CorrectDecisionLibOID = #CorrectDecisionLibOID#
MeasureResponseDt = #MeasureResponseDt#
Qa = #Qa#
BlockadeMaterialFl = #BlockadeMaterialFl#
BlockadeOutProductFl = #BlockadeOutProductFl#
BlockadeProcessProductFl = #BlockadeProcessProductFl#
BlockadeFinishProductFl = #BlockadeFinishProductFl#
BlockadeStorageProductFl = #BlockadeStorageProductFl#
BlockadeShipProductFl = #BlockadeShipProductFl#
PlanUserOID = #PlanUserOID#
PoorPicture = #PoorPicture#
WHERE OID = #OID#
statements.select:
SELECT A.OID, AO.Name, AO.Type, AO.BPolicyOID, A.PlantLibOID, C.KorNm AS PlantNm, A.OccurrenceLibOID, D.KorNm AS OccurrenceNm, A.PartOID, B.Name AS PartNo, A.LotNo, A.OemLibOID, E.KorNm AS OemNm, A.WorkUserOID, N.Name AS WorkUserNm, A.WriteDt, A.PoorCnt , A.Title, A.OccurrenceAreaLibOID, F.KorNm AS OccurrenceAreaNm, A.InduceLibOID, G.KorNm AS InduceNm, A.DefectDegreeLibOID, H.KorNm AS DefectDegreeNm, A.ImputeLibOID, I.KorNm AS ImputeNm, A.ImputeDepartmentOID , L.Name AS ImputeDepartmentNm, A.ImputeSupplierOID, L.Name AS ImputeSupplierNm, A.Summary, A.PoorDetail, A.RecurrenceFl, A.OccurrencePlace, A.OccurrenceDt, A.CorrectDecisionLibOID, K.KorNm AS CorrectDecisionNm, A.MeasureResponseDt, A.Qa , A.BlockadeMaterialFl, A.BlockadeOutProductFl, A.BlockadeProcessProductFl, A.BlockadeFinishProductFl, A.BlockadeStorageProductFl , A.BlockadeShipProductFl, A.PlanUserOID, O.Name AS PlanUserNm, A.PoorPicture FROM T_DQMS_QUICK A LEFT JOIN V_DOBJECT AO ON A.OID = AO.OID LEFT JOIN V_DOBJECT B ON A.PartOID = B.OID AND B.Type = 'PART' LEFT JOIN T_DLIBRARY C ON A.PlantLibOID = C.OID LEFT JOIN T_DLIBRARY D ON A.OccurrenceLibOID = D.OID LEFT JOIN T_DLIBRARY E ON A.OemLibOID = E.OID LEFT JOIN T_DLIBRARY F ON A.OccurrenceAreaLibOID = F.OID LEFT JOIN T_DLIBRARY G ON A.InduceLibOID = G.OID LEFT JOIN T_DLIBRARY H ON A.DefectDegreeLibOID = H.OID LEFT JOIN T_DLIBRARY I ON A.ImputeLibOID = I.OID LEFT JOIN T_DLIBRARY J ON A.OccurrencePlace = J.OID LEFT JOIN T_DLIBRARY K ON A.CorrectDecisionLibOID = K.OID LEFT JOIN T_DOBJECT L ON A.ImputeDepartmentOID = L.OID AND L.Type = 'DEPARTMENT' LEFT JOIN T_DOBJECT M ON A.ImputeSupplierOID = M.OID AND M.Type = 'SUPPLIER' LEFT JOIN T_DOBJECT N ON A.WorkUserOID = N.OID AND N.Type = 'PERSON' LEFT JOIN T_DOBJECT O ON A.PlanUserOID = O.OID AND O.Type = 'PERSON'
A.OID = #OID#
A.PlanUserOID = #PlanUserOID#
A.Title LIKE '%' + #Title# + '%'
A.PartOID = #PartOID#
B.Name = #PartNo#

SELECT A.OccurrenceDt, D.KorNm AS OccurrenceNm, B.Name AS PartNo, 'PART_NM' AS PartNm, 'CAR_CODE' AS CarCode, 'PART_GRP_NM' AS PartGrpNm, A.Summary. B.CreateUsNm
FROM T_DQMS_QUICK A LEFT JOIN V_DOBJECT B ON A.OID = B.OID LEFT JOIN V_DOBJECT C ON A.PartOID = C.OID AND C.Type = 'PART' LEFT JOIN T_DLIBRARY D ON A.OccurrenceLibOID = D.OID
statements.insert: INSERT INTO T_DQMS_QUICK_MODULE (OID, QuickOID, ModuleFl) VALUES (#OID#, #QuickOID#, 1)
statements.update: UPDATE T_DQMS_QUICK_MODULE SET ModuleFl = #ModuleFl#, EstEndDt = #EstEndDt#, ChargeUserOID = #ChargeUserOID# WHERE OID = #OID#
statements.select:
SELECT A.*, B.Type AS ModuleType, B.BPolicyOID, C.Name AS ChargeUserNm, D.Name AS BPolicyNm FROM T_DQMS_QUICK_MODULE A LEFT JOIN T_DOBJECT B ON A.OID = B.OID LEFT JOIN T_DOBJECT C ON A.ChargeUserOID = C.OID AND C.Type = 'PERSON' LEFT JOIN T_BPOLICY D ON B.BPolicyOID = D.OID
A.QuickOID = #QuickOID#
A.OID = #OID#
B.Type = #ModuleType#
A.ModuleFl = #ModuleFl#
ORDER BY OID
statements.update: UPDATE T_DQMS_BLOCKADE SET TargetScope = #TargetScope#, Act = #Act#, TargetCnt = #TargetCnt#, ActDepartmentOID = #ActDepartmentOID#, ActUserOID = #ActUserOID#, ActStartDt = #ActStartDt#, ActEndDt = #ActEndDt#, SortSuitableCnt = #SortSuitableCnt#, SortIncongruityCnt = #SortIncongruityCnt#, ReworkCnt = #ReworkCnt#, DisuseCnt = #DisuseCnt#, SpecialCnt = #SpecialCnt#, EtcCnt = #EtcCnt# WHERE OID = #OID#
statements.select:
SELECT A.OID, B.Type, B.Name, B.BPolicyOID, A.ModuleOID, A.TargetScope, A.Act, A.TargetCnt, A.ActDepartmentOID, C.Name AS ActDepartmentNm, A.ActUserOID, D.Name AS ActUserNm, A.ActStartDt , A.ActEndDt, A.SortSuitableCnt, A.SortIncongruityCnt, A.ReworkCnt, A.DisuseCnt, A.SpecialCnt, A.EtcCnt, B.Description FROM T_DQMS_BLOCKADE A LEFT JOIN T_DOBJECT B ON A.OID = B.OID LEFT JOIN T_DOBJECT C ON A.ActDepartmentOID = C.OID LEFT JOIN T_DOBJECT D ON A.ActUserOID = D.OID
A.OID = #OID#
A.ModuleOID = #ModuleOID#
A.Type = #Type#
statements.insert: INSERT INTO T_DQMS_OCCURRENCE_CAUSE (OID, ModuleOID, OccurrenceCauseLibOID) VALUES (#OID#, #ModuleOID#, #OccurrenceCauseLibOID#)
statements.update: UPDATE T_DQMS_OCCURRENCE_CAUSE SET OccurrenceCauseLibOID = #OccurrenceCauseLibOID# WHERE OID = #OID#
statements.select:
SELECT A.OID, B.Name, B.BPolicyOID, B.Description, A.ModuleOID, A.OccurrenceCauseLibOID, C.KorNm AS OccurrenceCauseLibText FROM T_DQMS_OCCURRENCE_CAUSE A LEFT JOIN T_DOBJECT B ON A.OID = B.OID LEFT JOIN T_DLIBRARY C ON A.OccurrenceCauseLibOID = C.OID
A.OID = #OID#
A.ModuleOID = #ModuleOID#
statements.insert: INSERT INTO T_DQMS_OCCURRENCE_WHY (OID, CauseOID, OccurrenceCauseDetail) VALUES (#OID#, #CauseOID#, #OccurrenceCauseDetail#)
statements.update: UPDATE T_DQMS_OCCURRENCE_WHY SET OccurrenceCauseDetail = #OccurrenceCauseDetail# WHERE OID = #OID#
statements.select:
SELECT A.OID, B.Name, B.BPolicyOID, B.Description, A.CauseOID, A.OccurrenceCauseDetail FROM T_DQMS_OCCURRENCE_WHY A LEFT JOIN T_DOBJECT B ON A.OID = B.OID WHERE B.DeleteDt IS NULL
A.OID = #OID#
A.CauseOID = #CauseOID#
statements.update: MERGE INTO T_DQMS_DETECT_COUNTERMEASURE AS T USING ( SELECT #ModuleOID# AS ModuleOID , #DetectM# AS DetectM , #DetectMDetail# AS DetectMDetail , #DetectS# AS DetectS , #DetectSDetail# AS DetectSDetail , #DetectQ# AS DetectQ , #DetectQDetail# AS DetectQDetail , #DetectE# AS DetectE , #DetectEDetail# AS DetectEDetail , #LeakCause1# AS LeakCause1 , #LeakCause2# AS LeakCause2 , #LeakCause3# AS LeakCause3 , #DetectDt# AS DetectDt , #Measure# AS Measure) B ON T.ModuleOID = B.ModuleOID WHEN MATCHED THEN UPDATE SET DetectM = B.DetectM, DetectMDetail = B.DetectMDetail, DetectS = B.DetectS, DetectSDetail = B.DetectSDetail, DetectQ = B.DetectQ, DetectQDetail = B.DetectQDetail, DetectE = B.DetectE, DetectEDetail = B.DetectEDetail, LeakCause1 = B.LeakCause1, LeakCause2 = B.LeakCause2, LeakCause3 = B.LeakCause3, DetectDt = B.DetectDt, Measure = B.Measure WHEN NOT MATCHED THEN INSERT ( ModuleOID, DetectM, DetectMDetail, DetectS, DetectSDetail, DetectQ, DetectQDetail, DetectE, DetectEDetail, LeakCause1, LeakCause2, LeakCause3, DetectDt, Measure) VALUES ( #ModuleOID#, #DetectM#, #DetectMDetail#, #DetectS#, #DetectSDetail#, #DetectQ#, #DetectQDetail#, #DetectE#, #DetectEDetail#, #LeakCause1#, #LeakCause2#, #LeakCause3#, #DetectDt#, #Measure#);
statements.select:
SELECT A.ModuleOID, A.DetectM, B.BPolicyOID, A.DetectMDetail, A.DetectS, A.DetectSDetail, A.DetectQ, A.DetectQDetail, A.DetectE, A.DetectEDetail, A.LeakCause1, A.LeakCause2, A.LeakCause3, A.DetectDt, A.Measure FROM T_DQMS_DETECT_COUNTERMEASURE A
A.ModuleOID = #ModuleOID#
statements.insert: INSERT INTO T_DQMS_IMPROVE_COUNTERMEASURE (OID, ModuleOID, RootCause, ImproveCountermeasure, ProcessDt) VALUES (#OID#, #ModuleOID#, #RootCause#, #ImproveCountermeasure#, #ProcessDt#)
statements.update: UPDATE T_DQMS_IMPROVE_COUNTERMEASURE SET RootCause = #RootCause#, ImproveCountermeasure = #ImproveCountermeasure#, ProcessDt = #ProcessDt# WHERE OID = #OID#
statements.select:
SELECT A.OID, B.Name, B.BPolicyOID, B.Description, A.ModuleOID, A.RootCause, A.ImproveCountermeasure, A.ProcessDt FROM T_DQMS_IMPROVE_COUNTERMEASURE A LEFT JOIN T_DOBJECT B ON A.OID = B.OID WHERE B.DeleteDt IS NULL
A.OID = #OID#
A.ModuleOID = #ModuleOID#

SELECT A.* ,B.OID ,B.Name ,B.Description ,C.Name AS EduUserNm ,C.Description FROM T_DQMS_WORKER_EDU A LEFT JOIN T_DOBJECT B ON A.ModuleOID = B.OID LEFT JOIN T_DOBJECT C ON A.EduUserOID = C.OID WHERE B.DeleteDt IS NULL
B.OID = #OID#
A.ModuleOID = #ModuleOID#
A.EduDetail like "%" + #EduDetail# + "%"
A.EduPlan like "%" + #EduDetail# + "%"
A.EduDt between #EduSDt# and DATEADD(dd, 1, #EduEDt#)
A.EduUserOID = #EduUserOID#
statements.insert: INSERT INTO T_DQMS_WORKER_EDU (ModuleOID, EduDetail, EduPlan, EduDt, EduUserOID) VALUES (#ModuleOID#, #EduDetail#, #EduPlan#, #EduDt#, #EduUserOID#)
statements.update: UPDATE T_DQMS_WORKER_EDU SET EduDetail = #EduDetail#, EduPlan = #EduPlan#, EduDt = #EduDt#, EduUserOID = #EduUserOID# WHERE ModuleOID = #OID#
statements.select:
SELECT A.* , B.Name , B.Description , C.Name AS CheckUserNm FROM T_DQMS_CHECK A LEFT JOIN T_DOBJECT B ON A.ModuleOID = B.OID LEFT JOIN T_DOBJECT C ON A.CheckUserOID = C.OID WHERE B.DeleteDt IS NULL
A.ModuleOID = #ModuleOID#
statements.insert: INSERT INTO T_DQMS_CHECK (OID, ModuleOID, Cnt, CheckSt, CheckEt, CheckUserOID, CheckDt, CheckFl, CheckDetail, FinishFl, FinishDetail) VALUES (#OID#, #ModuleOID#, #Cnt#, #CheckSt#, #CheckEt#, #CheckUserOID#, #CheckDt#, #CheckFl#, #CheckDetail#, #FinishFl#, #FinishDetail#)
statements.update: UPDATE T_DQMS_CHECK SET CheckSt = #CheckSt#, CheckEt = #CheckEt#, CheckUserOID = #CheckUserOID#, CheckDt = #CheckDt#, CheckFl = #CheckFl#, CheckDetail = #CheckDetail#, FinishFl = #FinishFl#, FinishDetail = #FinishDetail# WHERE ModuleOID = #ModuleOID# AND OID = #OID#
statements.insert: INSERT INTO T_DQMS_STANDARD_DOC (OID, ModuleOID, DocType, DocOID, DocSummary, DocCompleteDt) VALUES (#OID#, #ModuleOID#, #DocType#, #DocOID#, #DocSummary#, #DocCompleteDt#)
statements.update: UPDATE T_DQMS_STANDARD_DOC SET DocType = #DocType#, DocOID = #DocOID#, DocSummary = #DocSummary#, DocCompleteDt = #DocCompleteDt# WHERE OID = #OID# AND ModuleOID = #ModuleOID#
statements.select:
SELECT A.*, B.OID, B.BPolicyOID, B.Name, B.Description, C.Name AS CheckUserNm FROM T_DQMS_ERROR_PRROF A LEFT JOIN T_DOBJECT B ON A.ModuleOID = B.OID LEFT JOIN T_DOBJECT C ON A.CheckUserOID = C.OID WHERE B.DeleteDt IS NULL
A.ModuleOID = #ModuleOID#
B.OID = #OID#
statements.insert: INSERT INTO T_DQMS_ERROR_PRROF (ModuleOID, EstDt, ActDt, CheckDetail, CheckUserOID) VALUES (#ModuleOID#, #EstDt#, #ActDt#, #CheckDetail#, #CheckUserOID#)
statements.update: UPDATE T_DQMS_ERROR_PRROF SET EstDt = #EstDt#, ActDt = #ActDt#, CheckDetail = #CheckDetail#, CheckUserOID = #CheckUserOID# WHERE ModuleOID = #ModuleOID#
statements.select:
SELECT A.* , B.OID , B.BPolicyOID , B.Name , B.Description , C.Name AS LpaCheckUserNm , D.Name AS PartNm , E.Name AS LpaUserNm , F.Name AS MeasureUserNm FROM T_DQMS_LPA_UNFIT A LEFT JOIN T_DOBJECT B ON A.ModuleOID = B.OID LEFT JOIN T_DOBJECT C ON A.LpaCheckUserOID = C.OID LEFT JOIN T_DOBJECT D ON A.PartOID = D.OID LEFT JOIN T_DOBJECT E ON A.LpaUserOID = E.OID LEFT JOIN T_DOBJECT F ON A.MeasureUserOID = F.OID WHERE B.DeleteDt IS NULL
A.ModuleOID = #ModuleOID#
statements.insert: INSERT INTO T_DQMS_LPA_UNFIT (ModuleOID, LayerLibOID, AuditLibOID, LpaGrpLibOID, LpaUseLibOID, LpaCheckProcessLibOID, LpaCheckUserOID, LpaCheckDt, EquipmentNm, PartOID, LpaUserOID, FinishRequestDt, MeasureUserOID) VALUES (#ModuleOID#, #LayerLibOID#, #AuditLibOID#, #LpaGrpLibOID#, #LpaUseLibOID#, #LpaCheckProcessLibOID#, #LpaCheckUserOID#, #LpaCheckDt#, #EquipmentNm#, #PartOID#, #LpaUserOID#, #FinishRequestDt#, #MeasureUserOID#)
statements.update: UPDATE T_DQMS_LPA_UNFIT SET LayerLibOID = #LayerLibOID#, AuditLibOID = #AuditLibOID#, LpaGrpLibOID = #LpaGrpLibOID#, LpaUseLibOID = #LpaUseLibOID#, LpaCheckProcessLibOID = #LpaCheckProcessLibOID#, LpaCheckUserOID = #LpaCheckUserOID#, LpaCheckDt = #LpaCheckDt#, EquipmentNm = #EquipmentNm#, PartOID = #PartOID#, LpaUserOID = #LpaUserOID#, FinishRequestDt = #FinishRequestDt#, MeasureUserOID = #MeasureUserOID# WHERE ModuleOID = #ModuleOID#
statements.select:
SELECT A.*, B.Name, B.Description FROM T_DQMS_LPA_UNFIT_CHECK A LEFT JOIN T_DOBJECT B ON A.ModuleOID = B.OID WHERE B.DeleteDt IS NULL
A.ModuleOID = #ModuleOID#
statements.insert: INSERT INTO T_DQMS_LPA_UNFIT_CHECK (OID, ModuleOID, CheckPoin, CauseAnalysis, ImproveCountermeasure) VALUES (#OID#, #ModuleOID#, #CheckPoin#, #CauseAnalysis#, #ImproveCountermeasure#)
statements.update: UPDATE T_DQMS_LPA_UNFIT_CHECK SET CheckPoin = #CheckPoin#, CauseAnalysis = #CauseAnalysis#, ImproveCountermeasure = #ImproveCountermeasure# WHERE OID = #OID# AND ModuleOID = #ModuleOID#
statements.insert: INSERT INTO T_DQMS_LPA_MEASURE (ModuleOID, CauseAnalysis, ImproveCountermeasure) VALUES (#ModuleOID#, #CauseAnalysis#, #ImproveCountermeasure#)
statements.update: UPDATE T_DQMS_LPA_MEASURE SET CauseAnalysis = #CauseAnalysis#, ImproveCountermeasure = #ImproveCountermeasure# WHERE ModuleOID = #ModuleOID#;
statements.select:
SELECT A.ModuleOID, A.CauseAnalysis, A.ImproveCountermeasure , B.OID , B.BPolicyOID , B.Name , B.Description FROM T_DQMS_LPA_MEASURE A LEFT JOIN T_DOBJECT B ON A.ModuleOID = B.OID WHERE B.DeleteDt IS NULL
A.ModuleOID = #ModuleOID#
B.OID = #OID#

SELECT A.*, B.Name, B.Description FROM T_DQMS_OPENISSUE A LEFT JOIN T_DOBJECT B ON A.ModuleOID = B.OID WHERE B.DeleteDt IS NULL
A.OID = #OID#
statements.insert: INSERT INTO T_DQMS_OPENISSUE (OID, CustomerLibOID, CarLibOID, ProductOID, ProjectOID, ProcessOID) VALUES (#OID#, #CustomerLibOID#, #CarLibOID#, #ProductOID#, #ProjectOID#, #ProcessOID#)
statements.update: UPDATE T_DQMS_OPENISSUE SET CustomerLibOID = #CustomerLibOID#, CarLibOID = #CustomerLibOID#, ProductOID = #ProductOID# WHERE OID = #OID#
statements.select:
SELECT A.*, B.Name, B.Description FROM T_DQMS_OPENISSUE_ITEM A LEFT JOIN T_DOBJECT B ON A.ModuleOID = B.OID WHERE B.DeleteDt IS NULL
A.OID = #OID#
statements.insert: INSERT INTO T_DQMS_OPENISSUE_ITEM (OID, RelapseInsideFl, RelapseHanonFl, RelapseCarFl, OpenIssueDetailDesc, OpenIssueOccurrenceDt, OpenIssueExpectedDt, OpenIssueCompleteDt, OpenIssueCloseFl) VALUES (#OID#, #RelapseInsideFl#, #RelapseHanonFl#, #RelapseCarFl#, #OpenIssueDetailDesc#, #OpenIssueOccurrenceDt#, #OpenIssueExpectedDt#, #OpenIssueCompleteDt#, #OpenIssueCloseFl#)
statements.update: UPDATE T_DQMS_OPENISSUE_ITEM SET RelapseInsideFl = #RelapseInsideFl#, RelapseHanonFl = #RelapseHanonFl#, RelapseCarFl = #RelapseCarFl#, OpenIssueDetailDesc = #OpenIssueDetailDesc#, OpenIssueOccurrenceDt = #OpenIssueOccurrenceDt#, OpenIssueExpectedDt = #OpenIssueExpectedDt#, OpenIssueCompleteDt = #OpenIssueCompleteDt#, OpenIssueCloseFl = #OpenIssueCloseFl# WHERE OID = #OID#
statements.select:
SELECT A.* FROM T_DQMS_OPENISSUE_RELATIONSHIP A
A.FromOID = #FromOID#
A.ToOID = #ToOID#
A.type = #type#
statements.insert: INSERT INTO T_DQMS_OPENISSUE_RELATIONSHIP (FromOID, ToOID, type, CreateDt, CreateUs) VALUES (#FromOID#, #ToOID#, #type#, GETDATE(), #CreateUs#)
statements.delete: DELETE FROM T_DQMS_OPENISSUE_RELATIONSHIP WHERE FromOID = #FromOID# AND ToOID = #ToOID# AND type = #type#
